name: Fabian Steuer
comment: Roman is one of the best product designers I have ever worked with. I had the pleasure to be his manager at MyWallSt for almost a year and saw him grow from a new hire to MyWallSt's lead designer.

name: Nora Gasparik
comment: Roman is by far one of the best interaction designers I've ever worked with. His discipline, work ethic and enthusiasm are second to none.  He is super-talented, thoughtful, organised and easy to work with.

name: Gioia Michele
comment: In particular, I thank Roman for the precious operational support in the realization of the Design System for SIAE. It was essential for us to have his support and end-to-end approach.

name: Massimo Ruggirello
comment: Romanâ€™s creative talent is the best I have seen. His attention to detail and phenomenal skill is best in class. His designs would always delight our clients and they always wanted him to work on their projects.

name: Daniel Bedusa
comment: Roman is a professional who loves his job. Attentive to detail and a perfectionist, he never stops trying to improve his designs until they are flawless. I am sure that a great future awaits him and I hope to be able to collaborate with him again.

name: Iacopo Bellavia
comment: I collaborated with Roman on the creation of several websites. In particular, his role was the Web Designer, a role in which he proved to be a really good partner.
